Reviews.Title: “If you dont mind being grounded to your room after 8pm by an armed security guard, welcome home.”
Reviews.Author: mlth0mas
Reviews.Content: im 41 yr spent 3 yrs traveling 300 days staying motels country stay mom 75 yr husband rented spend weekend visiting saturday night sitting outside bottom floor enjoying spring night talking 9pm drinking loud nor guests call complain noise none armed security guard approached told chairs inside allowed sit outside 8pm dont wrong understand hotel people drinking raising hell hours night dont security car safe break wild parties treated child sent 9 oclock treat paying behaved customer pool locked guests sit outside talk except outside safety potentially obstructing sidewalk provide guest sit outside pool closed season security guard gun polite rule deal breaker stay twice staying motel 6 happen else 1 bad apple spoil day forward motel 6 tarnished mind
